message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $150?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $165. It's a great compromise, if you ask me!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Could we possibly aim for $150? That would be within my budget.
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I can offer it to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to propose $150 as the final price for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and we can move forward with the purchase.
